item.title: How to Return a Response Entity in Spring Boot Webflux
item.description: In my last post on getting started with spring boot webflux and AWS DynamoDB, I mentioned that it wasn't immediately obvious to find a way to customize the response code in a spring boot RestController, so I opted to use handlers instead.
